data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 308,400 people living in the state of Hhohho.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hhohho, Swaziland
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Hhohho, Swaziland by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 49 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 308,400 citizens of Hhohho, Swaziland, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Hhohho to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Lord, please remember the Comorian, Maore people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, encourage every believer in Hhohho, Swaziland to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Hhohho. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.section_summary:
the state of Hhohho, Swaziland has a population of 308,400.

We estimate Hhohho has 6,168 people who might know Jesus, 185,040 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 117,192 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 49 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Hhohho, Swaziland to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received
